---
title: "Analysis for Atir2015"
output: html_document
date: "2024-01-23"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(jsonlite)


dat_loc <- "long_2017/data"
raw <- read_csv(here(dat_loc, "pilot_A.csv")) 


processed <- raw |> group_by(workerid) |> 
  mutate(is_practice=case_when(
    str_detect(stimulus, "Practice")~"practice",
    str_detect(stimulus,"Block")~"critical",
    T  ~ NA)) |> 
  fill(is_practice) |> 
  filter(!is.na(ask)) |> 
  select(workerid, is_practice, ask, type, correct, rt, left, right, response, trial_index)
  
```
